{{disambig-more: '''''nan''''' or ('''''nand-''''', '''''nan(d)'''''), is a noun meaning "valley, vale" in [[Sindarin]].<ref>{{L
'''''Nan''''' is a [[Noldorin]] (or perhaps [[Doriathrin]]) word glossed as "land at foot of hills with many streams",<ref>{{VT
Nan: 45a}}, p. 36</ref> Noldorin '''''nand''''', '''''nann''''' is glossed as "wide grassland", and Doriathrin '''''nand''''' is glossed as "field, valley".<ref name=LR>{{LR
